title: Meet Betsy Davos, Minister of Tramp Education
subtitle: The appointment of Betsy Davos as Minister of Education was a source of inspiration for an Internet idea detailing her alleged lack of qualifications for this work.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Donald Trump's candidate for the position of Minister of Education, billionaire Betsy Davis, has no degree or teaching experience, never went to a public school or sent her children to a single school, and supports funding for profit-making Christian schools for public schools; she obtained the job because she donated $9.5 million to the Trump campaign.
